title: Boosted Performance with Enhanced Security Features

topics.title: API Documentation Improvements
topics.summary: Several PRs have been merged to enhance API documentation handling, particularly addressing the issue of unexpected 'unknown' types. This includes adding support for more type kinds and improving the overall accuracy of API documentation.

topics.title: UI Enhancements and Fixes
topics.summary: Recent PRs focus on improving UI consistency and accessibility, including style adjustments for filter tabs, playground headings, and color contrasts in the filters UI. These changes aim to enhance user experience and visual coherence across the application.

topics.title: Performance and Security Enhancements
topics.summary: Recent changes have focused on improving performance, such as speeding up pre-commit hooks and implementing a server-side image proxy to enhance privacy and security when loading README images from third-party servers.

topics.title: Feature Implementations
topics.summary: New features have been introduced, including an alt text copy feature for the versions chart and updates to the Traditional Chinese translation. These enhancements aim to improve usability and accessibility for a broader audience.

topics.title: Versioning and Navigation Improvements
topics.summary: Improvements have been made to the version cards, making them clickable and highlighting the active version. This change aims to enhance navigation and clarity for users when selecting different versions of packages.
